body_html: I'd suggest trying read_batch_features()... it'll work in the older version of TF, and make it easier to deal with multiple (potentially sparse) features. It's also got a pretty simple implementation on top of standard Dataset transformations, so it's pretty hackable if you end up needing something different (just copy the code to your own project and customize it as necessary).

body: I'd suggest trying `read_batch_features()`... it'll work in the older version of TF, and make it easier to deal with multiple (potentially sparse) features. It's also got a pretty simple implementation on top of standard `Dataset` transformations, so it's pretty hackable if you end up needing something different (just copy the code to your own project and customize it as necessary).
